name: Garten Eden
overview: Garten Eden (also released in The Netherlands as Appel Vangen) is a German language "catch it" game similar to games like Kaboom. Except this time, you play a farmhand who must catch the apples falling from the tree. Misd too many, and you will be fired. Originally published in Happy Computer 1984/07. Then released by Courbois Software in Courbois Software #6430
